name: Hrvatsko društvo skladatelja
goal: HDS ZAMP is a non-profit association of its members/rightholders, operating in the field of collective management of authors’ rights for musical works. We are operating on the basis of the authorisation of the State Intellectual Property Office, and under the Croatian Copyright and Related Rights Law (CRRL), in Croatia.
interests: Communication, Competition, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Single market
